entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
